Summary: Quick start: scaffold a MauiReactor app and enable hot reload.
Remarks: Install the template, create a new project, and use EnableMauiReactorHotReload in Debug to iterate quickly. Alternatively, convert an existing MAUI app by switching to UseMauiReactorApp in Program.cs.
Example:
# Install template
dotnet new install Reactor.Maui.TemplatePack

# New project
dotnet new mauireactor -n QuickStart

# Enable hot reload (Program.cs)
#if DEBUG
    builder.EnableMauiReactorHotReload();
#endif

# Run
dotnet build QuickStart
dotnet run --project QuickStart
